duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and implement systems and procedures to improve production efficiency and quality in a bakery facility.
Troubleshoot and prioritize loss elimination opportunities through analysis of line data.
Lead root cause problem-solving on key losses for each line and department.
Develop and guide staff to accept and adhere to Lean practices and support Kaizen events.
Ensure production leaders are set up for success and work in unison with the management team to analyze and improve preemptive items for producing products.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Industrial Engineering, Food Manufacturing, or related field (Master's preferred)
